Price Mistake

Home Depot Accidentally Listed Their Entire Milwaukee Tools Line at 95% Off

October 23, 2024 12:04 AM EST Bandar's Bounties
Hero Image: Home Depot Milwaukee Tools Glitch Replace with screenshot of the glitched listing

The Glitch That Broke the Internet

In the early hours of October 23, 2024, something unbelievable happened on HomeDepot.com. A system-wide pricing error caused Home Depot's entire Milwaukee Tools brand line to be listed at roughly 95% off retail prices. We're talking power drills, impact drivers, circular saws, combo kits, batteries — the works. Tools that normally retail for $300-$500+ were showing up for pennies on the dollar.

Most people were asleep. Most deal groups missed it entirely. But at 12:04 AM EST, Bandar's Bounties members received the alert that would change their week.

"Milwaukee M18 FUEL 18V Lithium-Ion Brushless Cordless Combo Kit — originally $449, showing as $22.45. This is NOT a drill... well, actually it is."

— Actual alert sent to Bandar's Bounties members

Members Moved Fast

Within minutes of the alert dropping, Bandar's Bounties members flooded the Home Depot checkout. The pricing error was live across the entire Milwaukee Tools catalog — from individual power tools to premium combo kits and high-capacity battery packs. Members loaded up their carts with everything they could grab before the glitch was corrected.

The window was tight. Home Depot's team eventually caught the error and corrected the pricing, but by then, hundreds of orders had already been placed and confirmed with order confirmation emails. The question on everyone's mind: would Home Depot actually honor these orders?

The Orders Actually Shipped

Days went by. Members watched their order statuses like hawks. Then, one by one, the shipping notifications started rolling in. Home Depot was actually fulfilling the orders. No cancellations. No price adjustments. The tools were on their way.

Member Success #1 Order confirmation screenshot
Member Success #2 Shipping notification screenshot
Member Success #3 Delivery photo
Member Success #4 Unboxing / haul photo

They All Arrived

Every single order shipped. Every single package arrived. Members were posting photos of stacks of brand-new Milwaukee tools — power drills, impact wrenches, oscillating multi-tools, reciprocating saws, and battery packs — all purchased at a fraction of retail. Some members saved thousands of dollars in a single checkout.

Member Success #5 Full haul laid out
Member Success #6 Receipt / order total

This is the kind of win that doesn't happen by accident — well, the glitch was an accident, but catching it at 12:04 AM? That takes a team that never sleeps. Bandar's Bounties monitors retailers around the clock so members never miss moments like these.

Don't Miss the Next One

Price mistakes like this happen more often than you think. The difference is being in the right group when they drop.
